title: What was Eddie Van Halen's greatest song? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm going to add this to the answer…one thing I always liked about Eddie is when he was photographed with his guitar, he always had a smile on his face. A lot of times guitar players will stand there with their guitar and try to look like a battle hardened warrior. Eddie apparently didn't think that was necessary…and neither do I. Best song ….and he has a long list…I will choose “ice cream man"…the solo is incredible…it also sends out the message …the new “guitar God has arrived”.
A sad question, and very quick off the mark… I was just thinking about this, and I’d still go with the surprisingly restrained and understated “Push Comes To Shove”.
